DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial compare growth tolerance infant consume investigational cow 's milk-based infant formula consume market cow 's milk-based infant formula approximately 4 month age .
DOC.brief_title: Growth Tolerance Healthy Term Infants Fed Cow 's Milk-Based Infant Formulas
DOC.criteria: Singleton 1014 day age randomization Term infant birth weight minimum 2500 gram Solely formula feed Signed inform consent protect health information History underlie metabolic chronic disease , anemia , immune compromise Feeding difficulty formula intolerance
